title: No-Code for Citizen Developers
description: The number of people who want to create applications on Cardano far outpaces the number of individuals with the required technical expertise
solution: Reach out to workspaces around the globe to reach and train Citizen Developers in using the no-code platform Qmodeler.
experience: Ferdon is a team of 20 individuals who have been building a seminal no-code application Ferdon for over 4 years,
